fields.name: AssociatedResourceIds
fields.description: The list of resource IDs for the other Microsoft.NetworkCloud resources that have attached this network.

fields.name: ClusterId
fields.description: The resource ID of the Network Cloud cluster this L2 network is associated with.

fields.name: DetailedStatus
fields.description: The more detailed status of the L2 network.

fields.name: DetailedStatusMessage
fields.description: The descriptive message about the current detailed status.

fields.name: HybridAksClustersAssociatedIds
fields.description: Field Deprecated. These fields will be empty/omitted. The list of Hybrid AKS cluster resource ID(s) that are associated with this L2 network.

fields.name: HybridAksPluginType
fields.description: Field Deprecated. The field was previously optional, now it will have no defined behavior and will be ignored. The network plugin type for Hybrid AKS.

fields.name: InterfaceName
fields.description: The default interface name for this L2 network in the virtual machine. This name can be overridden by the name supplied in the network attachment configuration of that virtual machine.

fields.name: L2IsolationDomainId
fields.description: The resource ID of the Network Fabric l2IsolationDomain.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning state of the L2 network.

fields.name: VirtualMachinesAssociatedIds
fields.description: Field Deprecated. These fields will be empty/omitted. The list of virtual machine resource ID(s), excluding any Hybrid AKS virtual machines, that are currently using this L2 network.
